testcase.ruleMessage: The calculation in the extension taxonomy from ${extCalcTargetName} to ${extCalcSourceName} is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation.\n\n{${extCalcSourceName}}

variation.name: Case showing a fail where the company has reversed the calculations from that shown in the IFRS taxonomy.
variation.description:
The calculation in the extension taxonomy rolling up from Borrowings to LongtermBorrowings in 1090 - Disclosure - Debt - Summary of Detailed Information About Borrowings (Detail) is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base taxonomy. Check that the calculation is correct or that you have used the correct tag for the two elements identified in the calculation It is possible that the calculation is correct in the case of a reconciliation calculation.
Check that the concept LongtermBorrowings is the correct calculation parent for this element.

Rule version 6.0.

variation.name: Creates a Fail case when the calculation in the extension taxonomy from Revenues to SalesRevenueNet is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy.
variation.description: Creates a Fail case when the calculation in the extension taxonomy from Revenues to SalesRevenueNet is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy.

variation.name: Creates a fail case when the calculation in the extension taxonomy from StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest to StockholdersEquity is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy
variation.description: Creates a fail case when the calculation in the extension taxonomy from StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest to StockholdersEquity is the opposite of a calculation defined in the base US GAAP taxonomy

variation.name: Case showing reverse calculation error on the IFRS taxonomy
variation.description: Case showing reverse calculation error on the IFRS taxonomy
